Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Consuelo Almudena González at a corporate retreat in Madrid. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Consuelo Almudena González is a 37 year old and comes from Spain.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Consuelo Almudena González is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Consuelo earned her secondary school diploma from IES Francisco de Quevedo Valladolid in 1995.
Consuelo attended Pompeu Fabra University and graduated in 2012.
Occupation History:
Consuelo Almudena González is a 37 year old Art Advisor from Spain.
At CaixaForum, Consuelo Almudena González held the position of Art Dealer from 2011 to 2012, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Gallery Owner at CaixaForum in 2013, further expanding her skill set.
At CaixaForum, she worked as a Art Advisor from 2018 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 120000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Córdoba and Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Private Equity Manager, she received an inheritance of 1690000 EUR in 2016, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
